footer.aboutMeText1: I am a freelance Full Stack Developer and IT Solution Architect with over 10 years of expertise in developing comprehensive software solutions and microservice architectures. My focus lies on scalable cloud solutions, where clean code and sustainable engineering are not just buzzwords but a lived practice. With my architectural experience and strong communication skills, I efficiently distill complex requirements— from conception to implementation.
footer.responseTime: Emails are contented on the same day or at the latest within 1–2 business days.
footer.contactPhone: I look forward to getting in touch with you directly by phone. Please contact me via email first so we can arrange a suitable appointment.
footer.copyright: © {{year}} Younes El Ouarti – All rights reserved

tooltips.consultationOnly: Unfortunately, I am unable to take on new projects until the end of {{month}} {{year}}. However, consultations are possible at any time.

introduction.title: Let me introduce myself
introduction.description: as a freelance Full Stack Developer and IT Solution Architect, I bring over 10 years of expertise in developing holistic software solutions and microservice architectures. My focus is on scalable cloud solutions, where clean code and sustainable engineering are not just buzzwords but practiced principles. With my architectural experience and communicative strength, I efficiently bring complex requirements to the point – from conception to implementation.

home.quote: Limitation reveals not restriction, but the source of true innovation.

communicator.title: Communicator
communicator.tagLine: Translates complex technology into understandable solutions

hybridRoles.title: Hybrid Roles
hybridRoles.tagLine: Seamlessly switches between architecture design and code lines

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.tagLine: hateoflux – my contribution to the reactive Spring world

callToAction.title: Curious to learn more?
callToAction.description: Whether for consultation, new projects, or simply getting to know each other – contact me, and together we'll find out how I can help you.

expertise.technicalExpertiseP1: The complexity of modern software development requires specialists who excel in specific areas while maintaining a holistic understanding of the entire development landscape. In my years of experience in developing enterprise solutions, I have developed a distinctive expert profile characterized by strong backend development and architectural design, complemented by practical experience across the entire spectrum of software development.
expertise.technicalExpertiseP2: This visualization showcases my technical profile across five key dimensions of software development. My strongest foundation lies in backend development, where I have designed and implemented numerous microservices using Java and Spring. This is complemented by my architectural expertise, which I have contributed both as a hands-on developer and as a solution architect in large projects. In the area of testing, my years of experience in implementing comprehensive testing strategies are reflected—from unit tests to system-wide performance tests. I have continuously built and practically applied my DevOps skills alongside backend development and architectural work, routinely working with technologies such as Docker, Kubernetes, and Helm. In the frontend domain, I have successfully executed independent projects using Angular and React.
expertise.technicalExpertiseP3: Each dimension tells its own story of overcome challenges, developed solutions, and gained insights. Expand the sections below to delve deeper into my experiences in each area.

skillAccordion.title: Backend
skillAccordion.summary: My backend development experience focuses on Java-based microservice architectures and distributed systems. In a large project, I contributed to the development of a system for processing real-time data across a fleet of microservices primarily using Spring (MVC & WebFlux), with a couple of supporting services written in Python. The system handles several terabytes of data daily through procedural and reactive programming using multiple PostgreSQL databases and RabbitMQ for asynchronous communication. Other projects included backend systems for mobile devices and control systems in Java (JBoss/JavaEE) and C++.
keyAchievements: Developed a reactive blob storage microservice handling multiple terabytes of daily data using Spring WebFlux
Performance optimization of critical services: reduced processing times by >98% through systematic analysis of system metrics and log data
Designed and implemented a modular layout system for a rendering engine

skillAccordion.title: Architecture
skillAccordion.summary: As a Solution Architect, I design scalable, distributed systems with a focus on microservice architectures. In a large project, I worked as one of several solution architects on the technical architecture of a complex information system. The emphasis was on designing systems for the asynchronous processing of terabytes of daily data, considering performance, scalability, and fault tolerance.
keyAchievements: Technical leadership of a 7-member team (DevOps, Testing, Development) focusing on agile development methodologies
Developed proof-of-concepts for new microservices and tools based on Spring Boot
Designed a modular system architecture for a digitization project applying psychological and mathematical principles

skillAccordion.title: Frontend
skillAccordion.summary: In the frontend domain, I focus on developing modern web applications. I have developed several websites using Angular and React, as well as a JavaFX RichClient for device management. As part of my master's thesis, I created a UI/UX prototype to validate a technical concept for a digital transformation project, utilizing Figma for design and conducting systematic usability tests.
keyAchievements: Developed a UI/UX prototype with Figma to validate a technical digitization concept
Implemented a JavaFX RichClient for device commissioning and data recovery
Created various websites, including the one you are browsing now

skillAccordion.title: DevOps
skillAccordion.summary: In the DevOps domain, I focus on developing CI/CD pipelines, container technologies, and log management systems. I developed GitLab pipelines for numerous repositories, implemented specialized Docker containers, and set up log processing pipelines. The work includes AWS cloud services (especially S3), Docker/Docker Compose, Kubernetes/Helm, and various monitoring and logging tools such as Prometheus, Kibana, and Grafana. For open-source projects, I use GitHub with corresponding GitHub Actions workflows.
keyAchievements: Developed GitLab CI/CD pipelines for multiple repositories with systematic test integration
Developed a secure Docker container and a scalable log processing pipeline (Fluentd, RabbitMQ, Elasticsearch) with backpressure mechanisms
Integrated AWS Cloud with S3 and CloudFront for optimized content delivery

skillAccordion.title: Testing
skillAccordion.summary: My testing experience includes implementing various testing levels from unit tests (JUnit/pytest) to performance tests. I developed testing strategies for microservices and conducted systematic performance tests. A particular focus was on automating tests through continuous integration and generating realistic test data.
keyAchievements: Designed and implemented a test data generator for complex JSON data (1-3MB)
Introduced systematic performance testing with Gatling, including automated evaluation of Prometheus metrics
Developed automated integration tests for microservices using Cucumber or JUnit, including Docker-Compose-based test environments

education.introduction: Between 2011 and 2018, I studied at the Frankfurt University of Applied Sciences, first completing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering and then pursuing a part-time Master's degree in High Integrity Systems. This combination of Computer Science and Engineering provided me with a strong foundation in software development, hardware design, IT security, formal methods, and data-intensive systems.

degrees.description: International computer science program taught in English, specializing in formal methods, IT security, safety-critical systems, and with a strong focus on data analysis.
Combination of Computer Science and Engineering with a focus on software development, hardware design, and system integration.

certifications.introduction: My expertise in modern software development and IT services is backed by internationally recognized certifications. These include technical cloud competencies, agile methodologies, and IT service management—three key pillars for successful digital projects.

cards.title: AWS Cloud Practitioner
cards.description: Fundamental understanding of the AWS Cloud platform, including security, architecture, pricing, and services.

cards.title: Scrum Master (PSM I)
cards.description: Expertise in leading and supporting agile teams using the Scrum methodology, including Scrum events, artifacts, and roles.

cards.title: Certified Agile Requirements Specialist (CARS)
cards.description: Specialization in agile requirements analysis and management, focusing on user stories, backlog management, and value delivery.

cards.title: ITIL Foundation in IT Service Management
cards.description: Comprehensive knowledge of IT service management based on the ITIL framework, including service strategy, design, transition, and operation.

serviceOfferings.title: Service Offerings
serviceOfferings.text: With years of experience in Java backend development and solution architecture, I specialize in designing resilient, high-performance systems for enterprise-level projects. I combine solid technical craftsmanship with a proven track record in developing elegant, constraint-oriented solutions. Together, we transform your vision into a robust, scalable reality.

offerCardData.title: Backend
valueProposition: Development of scalable APIs and event-driven services
Migration of legacy systems to cloud-native solutions
Design of resilient data processing pipelines

offerCardData.title: Architecture
valueProposition: Creation of PoCs and support during technical implementation

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.text: Beyond technical excellence, successful collaborations are built on clear alignment. Here's what characterizes my ideal engagements:

idealProjects.title: Ideal Projects
items: Modern technology stacks or system modernization
Projects focused on code quality and engineering standards

engagementModel.title: Engagement Model
items: Preferably long-term (6+ months) backend systems or architecture overhauls
Daily rates for development and architecture

faq.intro: Common questions about my work approach and technical focus.

faqAccordion.title: What about Frontend or DevOps?
faqAccordion.content: I have sufficient knowledge to contribute in these areas. However, my focus is on backend and architecture. I can provide excellent support in an interface role. A role exclusively in frontend or DevOps, however, does not align with my core profile.

faqAccordion.title: Do you work with non-Java stacks?
faqAccordion.content: Java is by far my most important tool, where I work most efficiently. Python is also solid. I work with multiple tools and languages, depending on what makes the most sense. Shell and JavaScript are no problem either. However, if a completely different stack like .NET is required, I am unfortunately not the right person.

faqAccordion.title: What project scope makes sense for collaboration?
faqAccordion.content: The ideal scope starts with complex systems. Typically, these are projects with a duration of at least 6 months.

faqAccordion.title: Do you work with internal development teams?
faqAccordion.content: Absolutely. Collaboration with the existing team is even essential for sustainable system improvements. My role is to support the team with technical expertise and work together to achieve the best possible results.

faqAccordion.title: Are you available for short-term assignments?
faqAccordion.content: Yes and no. If it's just about consulting or a study, we could probably have a conversation. However, if someone is really only needed for a short time during a hot phase, I must decline.

contact.title: Let's get in touch
contact.introduction: Are you planning a new IT project or seeking technical expertise for existing systems? I support you with tailored solutions for sustainable and scalable architectures.

processingTime.title: Response Time
processingTime.description: Emails are answered on the same day or within 1-2 business days at the latest.

phone.title: Phone Contact
phone.description: I look forward to speaking with you directly by phone. Please contact me by email first so we can arrange a suitable appointment.

expertise.title: Specialized in scalable architectures
expertise.description1: With over 10 years of expertise, I efficiently bring your IT requirements to the point - from conception to sustainable implementation of complex systems.
expertise.description2: Ideal for projects with cloud solutions, microservices, and long-term technical orientation. Contact me for a non-binding initial assessment.
